Text: It is not fake. It is part 2.
Not a FAKE but IS the End if the show.
I wish it was fake. It took a lot to ebb the flow of tears this episode triggered.

Thank you! I'm so excited to see how Merlin ends, but on the other hand, I'm sad that there will be no Merlin. :( Ah well, all good things must come to an end, and at least they're going out when they're on top.
